feed.title: Miklb’s Mindless Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Chronicling life in a digital world. Touching on web dev, food, and a little of everything in between.

entry.content: Bought a mizudashi coffee pot & has changed how I drink coffee. Related, is 1000ml of cold brewed coffee too much? Asking for a friend

entry.content: Anyone know if Skype is only alternative to FaceTime for an Android user to video chat with iOS user? Looking for suggestions.

entry.content: First time utilizing Apple Notes with checklists, info and embedded map, all shared with my girlfriend. Definitely can see using this more.

entry.content: Hmm. There doesn’t seem to be a simple way to import markdown files FROM Jekyll into WordPress. Anyone solve this?

entry.title: My New Favorite Cover of Hallelujah

link.title: My New Favorite Cover of Hallelujah

entry.content:
It’s been a rough two weeks emotionally for a lot of us, maybe this cover of Hallelujah in Yiddish will have some healing effects as it did for me.

via Open Culture
entry.summary: It’s been a rough two weeks emotionally for a lot of us, maybe this cover of Hallelujah in Yiddish will have some healing effects as it did for me.
